1. Problem Discovery (1-5): Ability to uncover user pain points and synthesize insights.
2. Execution & Delivery (1-5): Track record of shipping impactful features, working cross-functionally.
3. Strategic Thinking (1-5): Evidence of roadmap ownership, OKR alignment, long-term vision.

variables.$TASK: Create an escalation playbook for handling Sev1 incidents that affect the payments API, ensuring stakeholders are updated every 30 minutes and mitigation steps are tracked.
variables.$TOOLS:
<function name="list_open_incidents" args="service" returns="incident_list" />
<function name="get_incident_timeline" args="incident_id" returns="timeline_entries" />
<function name="post_update" args="channel, message" returns="confirmation" />
<function name="assign_owner" args="incident_id, team" returns="assignment_receipt" />

initial_turns:
<turn role="user">
  <request>Create an escalation playbook for Sev1 incidents impacting the payments API.</request>
  <success_criteria>
    <item>Stakeholders receive updates every 30 minutes</item>
    <item>Mitigation steps are captured with owners</item>
  </success_criteria>
</turn>

plan.text: <observation role="system">Planning checkpoint acknowledged. State the next concrete step.</observation>

list_open_incidents.text:
<observation tool="list_open_incidents">
  <incidents>
    <incident id="INC-2041" severity="Sev1" status="ongoing">Payments API errors started at 05:10 UTC. Mitigation owner pending.</incident>
    <incident id="INC-2033" severity="Sev2" status="monitoring">Checkout latency spike resolved.</incident>
  </incidents>
  <next_action_hint>Retrieve the incident timeline for Sev1 IDs to inform mitigation tracking.</next_action_hint>
</observation>

get_incident_timeline.template:
<observation tool="get_incident_timeline">
  <timeline incident="{incident_id}">
    <entry at="05:10">Alert triggered for spike in payment failures.</entry>
    <entry at="05:15">Auto-remediation run failed.</entry>
    <entry at="05:22">On-call acknowledged incident.</entry>
  </timeline>
  <next_action_hint>Assign an owner to unresolved Sev1 incidents and capture mitigation steps.</next_action_hint>
</observation>

variables.$TASK: Orchestrate the first-hour response for a global payments outage impacting multiple regions. Package a briefing template and capture key decisions for the next shift.
variables.$TOOLS:
<function name="list_open_incidents" args="service" returns="incident_list" />
<function name="get_incident_timeline" args="incident_id" returns="timeline_entries" />
<function name="post_update" args="channel, message" returns="confirmation" />
<function name="assign_owner" args="incident_id, team" returns="assignment_receipt" />

initial_turns:
<turn role="user">
  <request>Coordinate the first-hour response for a global payments outage impacting multiple regions.</request>
  <success_criteria>
    <item>Provide a reusable briefing template</item>
    <item>Record key decisions, owners, and timing commitments for the next shift</item>
  </success_criteria>
</turn>

plan.text: <observation role="system">Planning checkpoint logged. Confirm the next specific move.</observation>

list_open_incidents.text:
<observation tool="list_open_incidents">

    <incident id="INC-3097" severity="Sev1" status="monitoring">Europe failover test in progress.</incident>

<observation tool="get_incident_timeline">
  <timeline incident="{incident_id}">

    <entry at="04:48">Traffic routed to backup provider; errors persisted in APAC.</entry>

</observation>
